member.name: T:FanControl.Plugins.IPlugin
member.summary: Interface to implement a plugin. The life-cycle of the plugin is as follow: Initialize => Load => Close. These methods should be able to be called in this order any number of times without any side-effect or undisposed resources.

member.name: P:FanControl.Plugins.IPlugin.Name
member.summary: Unique name of the plugin. Will be displayed in the UI.

member.name: M:FanControl.Plugins.IPlugin.Initialize
member.summary: Called whenever the program starts or a refresh (Close + Initialize) is executed.

member.name: M:FanControl.Plugins.IPlugin.Load(FanControl.Plugins.IPluginSensorsContainer)
member.summary: Provides a container to inject sensors into fan control.

member.name: M:FanControl.Plugins.IPlugin.Close
member.summary: Called whenever the program closes or a refresh (Close + Initialize) is executed.

member.name: T:FanControl.Plugins.IPlugin2
member.summary: Newer version of the plugin interface. Adds a "update hook" that can be used to update everything that is managed by the plugin in a single call

member.name: M:FanControl.Plugins.IPlugin2.Update
member.summary: Update hook, This method will be called periodically by FanControl during its internal update cycle.

member.name: M:FanControl.Plugins.IPluginControlSensor.Set(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the fan speed the control in percent. Called when the corresponding control is enabled.

member.name: M:FanControl.Plugins.IPluginControlSensor.Reset
member.summary: Reset the control to its default state. Called once when the corresponding control is disabled.

member.name: P:FanControl.Plugins.IPluginSensor.Name
member.summary: Name that will be displayed to the user

member.name: M:FanControl.Plugins.IPluginSensor.Update
member.summary: Update hook. This method will be called periodically by FanControl during its internal update cycle.

member.name: T:FanControl.Plugins.IPluginSensorsContainer
member.summary: Container to inject your sensors into FanControl.
